description.value: The family history describes any health problems of biological relatives that may be relevant. The family history contains information on the medical disorders of the family member and the biological relationship between the patient and the described family member.

purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-FamilyHistory](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-FamilyHistory) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.
